Text: Barry had said that you were asking about getting a pivot table for the WSCC new generation data I have set one up in the attached file Please let me know if you want to go through it Also please let me know if there are any discrepencies with the information you have Phil

Questar Open Season DocsHere are the documents on the Questar open seasons that Stephanie discussed with you Since the precedent agreements are binding we would like to put in some sort of contingency clause to give Enron a potential out Unfortunately we only have the PAs in pdf format so we may need to just write in whatever language we need The Denver office will be meeting with Questar on Tuesday or Wednesday to discuss the open season details and we can touch base after then Have a good holiday weekend Phil

Questar and Sonoran Open SeasonsI know that you have been busy with the Mexicana transaction but I wanted to see how things were going on your review of the Questar and Sonoran open season docs The Questar open season ends tomorrow May at p The Sonoran open season closes the following day Let me know if you need anything else Thanks Phil

SoCalGas WACOGStephanie Miller gave me your name as the person who might be able to help me track down the SoCal Gas WACOG calculation methodology Im looking at the Core Procurement Service schedule and it indicates that the WACOG calculation is set forth in D I am assume that this is a decision number from the California PUC I need to get a copy of the decision andor whatever information is relevant to the calculation Let me know if you can help Thanks Phil Polsky Associate West Gas Origination
